extendedInfo.description: â[Special Promotion]âMost intuitive and accurate (optimized) keyboard for mobile devices, W10!W10 keyboard won at 10th Anniversary Mobile Technology Award.You donât have to worry about big finger typos or depending on prediction of words any more.Just type your personal words with W10 keyboard!W10 keyboard is an innovative, simple & intuitive English alphabet input system that substantially speeds up mobile texting.  You are texting only with 10 basic alphabet letters.With W10, all 26 English alphabet letters can be formed by using the 10 basic alphabet characters and seamless usersâ experience of writing pattern.With one or two strokes of keypad, you complete each 26 English alphabet characters.The logic is simple! âªW theoryâ«Thereâre 10 basic alphabet letters, u, l, n, c, i, o, j, t, f, e, among 26 characters on 10 numeric phone keypads, and combine (or drag) 2 letters to make the rest of 16 letters like u+u=w, n+n=m, c+l=d, l+n=h, c+j=g, c+i=a, and so on.  You just type letters when you write letters on your smart phone.[Languages supported]W10 keyboard can be configured to many languages selected, and the user can switch between(or among) them at any time.*Language setting: go to âW10 keyboard Settingsâ then press âLanguage Selectionâ- English- French - German- Korean- Portuguese- Spanish*<>*[Features]- Multiple keyboard layouts (W10-portrait mode, QWERTY-landscape mode)- Gesture input (drag on touch screen) for combinable alphabet letters.- Support many languages (French, German, Korean, Portuguese and Spanish)- Accented, international character support (Input a letter then tab or long press on âaÃ¡AÃâ key)- Vibration/Sound mode- Variety of mark, sign, symbol and emoticon. - 3 speed mode for beginner, intermediate, and expert.- Lightening on next possible combinable letters.- Keyboard gesture control (Swipe right or left to access number or symbol keyboards)- Word completion algorithm (for English only)- Word correction algorithm (for English only)[How to enable W10 keyboard & Setting]After download W10, you can enable it on W10 Tutorial on Menu.- Press âgo to settingâ button â Check âW10 keyboardâ * When you install any of text input apps, there are Warning sign popped up on screen. Please ignore the sign, âthe keyboard collecting your personal data", this is a standard Android message when you activate any input method. We never collect any of usersâ personal data.*- Press âSet as Defaultâ button â Check âW10 keyboardâ- âNextâ button for how to use manual* For more information, you can visit tutorial and/or www.doubleu10.com web site.* If you have any trouble using the app, please email us ( ks@shelko.co.kr ) and we'll respond to you ASAP.YOU WRITE BY TOUCH! True mobile keyboard, W10!!< Keywords: W10, Keyboard, Typing, Text input, Text entry, Mobile texting, Samsung Galaxy, LG Optimus, HTC Desire HD, HTC Wildfire, HTC Nexus One, HTC Flyer, Motorola Atrix, Vega, Tablet, Galaxy Tab, Vega, Motorola XOOM, Dell Streak, LG Optimus Pad, Intuitive, Big Button >

reviews.comment: love it,best keyboard.a must have for small screen phones like mine,really easy to learn,very simple,no rocket science.GREAT app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: add support for tablet please...
reviews.comment: will be nice to have ten letters w choice sizes and movable for tablet. but lovz this app  so far
reviews.author: Scott Bobb

reviews.title: Messagease is better board with a similar concept
reviews.comment: I would like this keyboard if I didn\'t know about Messagease. I learned W10 quickly, and would choose it over a QWERTY board, but you can type letters on Messagease with single taps as opposed to the swipes W10 requires, which makes typing on Messagease much faster and easier. Access to special characters and punctuation is also much more user friendly on Messagease.
reviews.author: richardo wallace

reviews.title: Needs default keyboard type option (4x3 or qwerty)
reviews.comment: This app is great. It\'s exactly what I\'ve been looking for, but I prefer to use the 4x3 keyboard for my native language (Korean) and qwerty for English. I know that I can \'swipe up\' to switch between these two types but the swiping doesn\'t work well (inserting unwanted spaces or letters) and even annoying. Can the makers of W10 add another feature that allows me to set the default keyboard type for each language separately?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: complicated, but creative
reviews.comment: It\'s complicated, but creative. It\'ll be better if it supports more options such as auto capitalization or caps lock.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Idea!
reviews.comment: I was recently thinking of writing a similar keyboard after becoming frustrated with GKOS\'s tiny buttons. It\'s great to see something already out there! The combining is very easy to pick up, however there are some glaring problems that get in the way of fast typing. Number one is the swiping - every time i try to type an \'r\' or \'s\' quickly the keyboard dissappears or the layout changes. There\'s also a few unfortunate combos... it\'s impossibie to type \"to\" fast because it changes to \'p\'.
reviews.author: Rowan Worth

reviews.title: I have one single big button for a keyboard.
reviews.comment: if the button can be made larger then it will be perfect. sometimes my finger miss the button.
reviews.author: Brian Rahardi

reviews.title: Too much to remember
reviews.comment: Nice try but I will pass.
reviews.author: Michael Flint, SR

reviews.title: Android keyboard
reviews.comment: I have no spell check on my new phone and the quality of the word prediction was very poor. I like both styles of keyboards offered with this app. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Great, and stylish keyboard, I love it.  Only problem I have is that there\'s no automatic capitalization.  But other than that, I think it\'s great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excelent
reviews.comment: Very creative...unique!! Keep working:)))
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs drag only option.
reviews.comment: Anyway I could have a drag only option, I dont like hitting \"T\" then \"O\" and getting a \"P\". Im very fast with this keyboard.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice

reviews.title: nicekeyboard
reviews.comment: nice
reviews.author: pankaj bhatt

reviews.comment: It does my head in but I won\'t knock the concept. Probably more useful to those who like to text type than T9 users.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Keyboard!
reviews.comment: After watching the video, I had to download this on principal. Not disappointed at all!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The simplicity is utterly brilliant
reviews.comment: The app needs to get more publicity. Perhaps it needs a catchier name for search-ability. I stumbled on this gem by accident through 3 levels of indirection looking for a Korean input method. In addition to a standard Korean input method, I got a superior method of English input. Now I don\'t have to worry about big thumb typos ever again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: it DOES need a way to type dots dashes commas and so on from the numeric keypad. five stars if you do it. also... italian letters?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love it!
reviews.comment: It\'s kinda difficult at first but it\'s so cool!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Updated my comment. I\'ve mastered the W10 KB, and aside from fun to use its not as fast as I initially thought. The problem is the input for P and B.
